p: Total phenolic content (TPC) was quantified using Folin-Ciocalteu reagent, as described by Gao et al. [ 42]. Absorbance was measured using the same extract and spectrophotometer as in AA. Gallic acid was used to prepare calibration curves. This analysis was run in triplicate, and the results were expressed as gallic acid equivalents (GAE) L âˆ’1 of olive oil. Gallic acid was used to facilitate comparison with previous studies.
